short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically open specified links in new tabs at fixed or random time intervals, with optional incognito mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily schedule and launch your favorite URLs in the background at customizable intervals with our URL Scheduler extension! Perfect for users who need to periodically open websites, this extension acts as a powerful timer and launcher, letting you automatically open specific links in both standard and private (incognito) windows.

With its simple settings panel, you can set up a fixed or random interval timer for each URL, giving you complete control over how often each site is accessed. Ideal for researchers, task managers, and productivity enthusiasts, this scheduler helps streamline repetitive browsing tasks by running quietly in the background. For added privacy, simply enable the option to open links in an incognito window.

Features:

- Customizable interval scheduler for each URL.
- Option to open URLs in incognito (private window) mode.
- Background operation so that it works without interrupting your workflow.
- Choice between fixed or random intervals to keep your browsing dynamic.

Get organized and automate your browsing with this powerful URL scheduler and launcher â€“ a simple way to save time and maintain privacy.
